UPHUHLISO EKUHLALENI NOTHATHO NXAXHEBA LULUNTU: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



ICandelo Lophuhliso ekuhlaleni linemingwena yolula wula olululo liqmisekise inkqubo ephuwki leyo kwiphondo lentshona koloni.

Imisebenzi:

* Ikwajolise ekulawulweni, ekunxityelelanisweni, ekukhuthazeni nasekuncediseni abasebenzi bophuhliso loluntu.
* Ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ulawulo olululo lwentatho nxaxheba yoluntu oluqhubekayo.

Unxityelelaniso kwiNgingqi

Icandelo lonxityelelaniso kwiNgingqi lunxibelelanisa lukwalawula inkqubo yophuhliso loluntu kwingingqi. Likwadibana noluntu/izakhiwo zoluntu ngokunxulumene noziso lwenkonzo. Eli candelo likwalawula isixokelelwano solwazi ngokumalunga neenkqubo zobunkokheli.

Intatho nxaxheba yoluntu

Icandelo leNtatho nxaxheba yoLuntu lincedisa oomasipala kucwangciso, ekwenziweni, ekuphunyezweni nasekumiliselweni kweendlela zentatho nxaxheba yoluntu.

Likwa:

* ncedisa oomasipala ngesikhokelo, ingcebiso kunye noxhotyiso lwangaphakathi ukuseka nokumilisela iikomiti zewodi ezizizo.
* Ukuqwalasela nokuphonononga iikomiti zewadi
